component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.diff.service.DiffDisplayService
component.documentation:
This service provides an extension point to manage document diff display.
@author Antoine Taillefer

documentation.pre:
A diffDisplay contribution defines which diffBlocks will be displayed in the document diff view for a given document type. The order matters.
If the 2 diffed documents have the same type, the diffDisplay matching this type is used, otherwise or if such a diffDisplay does not exist, the diffDisplay with the Document type is used. If it does not exist a message is displayed to let the user know that no diffDisplay has been defined.

A diffBlock contribution defines which fields will be displayed in the diff display block. The order matters.
For complex types, items can be defined to specifiy which sub-fields must be displayed and in which order.
